title: The After Show Talks to Micky Pegg from All Saints Cigars
itunes:title: The After Show Talks to Micky Pegg from All Saints Cigars
description:
This week, The After Show welcomes Micky Pegg. Micky spent a lot of time in the cigar industry, then left, and now he’s back again.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
